--- title: "Summer-Themed Movies" author: "Neharika Shah" date: today categories: [movies] bibliography: references.bib format: html: toc: true toc-float: true text-align: true --- # Analysis of Trends,Genres and Popularity ![](summer-movies.jpg) Summer-themed movies have always captured the magic of the season, whether through light-hearted comedies or dramatic tales of self-discovery. This blog post explores the trends in the production, genre distribution, and audience reception of summer-themed movies using IMDb data, aiming to understand how this niche has evolved over time. ## **Data Description** 1. **Source of Data**: The data comes from IMDb, available via [@TidyTuesday](https://github.com/rfordatascience/tidytuesday/blob/master/data/2024/2024-07-30/readme.md) (dataset released on July 30, 2024). 2. **Description of Variables in the Dataset**: **summer_movies.csv:** - `tconst`: Unique identifier for each title (character) - `title_type`: Format of the title (movie, video, or tvMovie) (character) - `primary_title`: Popular title used for promotion (character) - `original_title`: Original title in the original language (character) - `year`: Release year (integer) - `runtime_minutes`: Primary runtime in minutes (integer) - `genres`: Up to three associated genres (character) - `simple_title`: Lowercase title with punctuation removed (character) - `average_rating`: Weighted average of user ratings on IMDb (double) - `num_votes`: Number of votes received on IMDb (integer) **summer_movie_genres.csv:** - `tconst`: Unique identifier for each title (character) - `genres`: Individual genres associated with the title (character) The `summer_movie_genres` dataset contains individual genres associated with each movie. 3. **Data Cleaning Steps**: - **Handled Missing Values**: Identified and addressed missing data entries to ensure completeness and accuracy in the analysis. - **Removed Duplicates**: Checked for and eliminated any duplicate records to avoid over-representation of movies in the dataset. - **Standardized Genre Formats**: Cleaned and standardized genre entries to ensure consistency, allowing for accurate genre analysis and visualization. - **Filtered Out Irrelevant Data**: Removed movies with less than 10 IMDb votes to focus on titles with sufficient audience engagement. - **Converted Data Types**: Ensured all columns, such as `year` and `runtime_minutes`, were in the correct data format (integer or character) for proper analysis. ::: {style="color: blue;"} ::: {.cell} ```{.r .cell-code} # snippet of the code which involves data cleaning summer_movies <- summer_movies %>% drop_na() %>% distinct() %>% mutate(genres = str_to_lower(genres)) ``` ::: ::: The above code snippet demonstrates handling missing values by removing incomplete entries, eliminating duplicate records for accuracy, and standardizing genre formats by converting them to lowercase for consistency. ## Analysis Let's dive into the trends and insights we uncovered. **Trend in Summer Movie Production** ::: {.cell} ::: ::: {.cell} ::: {.cell-output-display} ![Number of Summer-Themed Movies Produced Each Year](blogpost_files/figure-html/fig-movies-1.png){#fig-movies width=672} ::: ::: We can observe a surge in the production of summer-themed movies during the 1980s and 1990s in @fig-movies, suggesting that this period was a golden era for summer films. While the trend fluctuated in the following years, it remains a popular genre with consistent releases. ::: {.cell} ::: {.cell-output-display} ![Top 10 Genre Distribution of Summer-Themed Movies](blogpost_files/figure-html/fig-distribution-1.png){#fig-distribution width=672} ::: ::: Drama and comedy take the lead as the most popular genres in summer-themed films followed by romance and documentaries in @fig-distribution. These findings highlight how summer movies often center around lighthearted narratives or emotional stories, perfectly capturing the essence of personal growth, adventure, and the fun-filled experiences that many associate with the season. ::: {#tbl-top-movies .cell} ::: {.cell-output-display} `````{=html}

While lighthearted genres such as comedy and family films remain popular, the high ratings for more serious genres—particularly documentaries—highlight the broad appeal and evolving nature of summer-themed storytelling. The inclusion of music-themed movies among the top-rated films further aligns with the observation that these films resonate strongly with audiences, adding depth to the overall trends in summer movie preferences. ## Conclusion This analysis sought to uncover trends in the production, genres, and audience reception of summer-themed movies, highlighting how these films resonate with audiences across different categories. Our findings show that comedies and dramas dominate the genre landscape, capturing the spirit of summer with a balance of light-hearted and emotional storytelling. Meanwhile, documentaries and music-themed films also stand out with notably high ratings, suggesting that summer-themed movies have evolved to encompass a broader range of storytelling styles, appealing to diverse audience preferences. Moreover, the relation between higher ratings and specific genres like documentaries highlights the "bandwagon effect," where movies that capture a large audience often receive better ratings according to @Article. The bandwagon effect suggests that well-rated films tend to gather momentum and achieve higher popularity, further solidifying their place in the summer movie canon. In conclusion, summer-themed movies continue to offer a rich mix of genres, from feel-good comedies to thought-provoking documentaries. Their ability to engage a wide audience underscores their cultural relevance, with trends pointing towards an ever-expanding genre diversity that keeps the summer movie tradition alive.
